column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque is the real deal. You cannot go wrong. Especially if you order the brisket. Seriously. That brisket is the best. You will not have a better brisket! Pulled pork pretty awesome
column5: cornbread are all on point. I don't even mess with anything else because those items are so good! Try all the sauce. I like to mix the Carolina and the Memphis together. Lines can be long
column6: especially in good weather. Worth the wait. You aren't here for the atmosphere or the speed
column7: you are here for some damn good food! They do have a small parking lot in back
column8: you may get lucky with a spot. Otherwise
column9: you might need to drive around a little for a spot because it's on a residential street and a main road. But whatever. Just go!
